account_sid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Account the Custom Operator belongs to.

sid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Custom Operator.

friendly_name.description: A human-readable name of this resource, up to 64 characters.

description.description: A human-readable description of this resource, longer than the friendly name.

author.description: The creator of the Custom Operator. Custom Operators can only be created by a Twilio Account.

operator_type.description: Operator Type for this Operator. References an existing Operator Type resource.

version.description: Numeric Custom Operator version. Incremented with each update on the resource, used to ensure integrity when updating the Custom Operator.

availability.description: Custom Operator availability status. Possible values: internal, beta, public, retired.

config.description: Operator configuration, following the schema defined by the Operator Type. Only available on Operators created by the Account.

date_created.description: The date that this Custom Operator was created, given in ISO 8601 format.

date_updated.description: The date that this Custom Operator was updated, given in ISO 8601 format.

account_sid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Account.

media_url.description: Downloadable URL for media, if stored in Twilio AI.

service_sid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Service.

sid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Transcript.

account_sid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Account the Operator belongs to.

sid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Operator.

friendly_name.description: A human-readable name of this resource, up to 64 characters.

description.description: A human-readable description of this resource, longer than the friendly name.

author.description: The creator of the Operator. Either Twilio or the creating Account.

operator_type.description: Operator Type for this Operator. References an existing Operator Type resource.

version.description: Numeric Operator version. Incremented with each update on the resource, used to ensure integrity when updating the Operator.

availability.description: Operator availability status. Possible values: internal, beta, public, retired.

config.description: Operator configuration, following the schema defined by the Operator Type. Only available on Custom Operators created by the Account.

date_created.description: The date that this Operator was created, given in ISO 8601 format.

date_updated.description: The date that this Operator was updated, given in ISO 8601 format.

service_sid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Service.

operator_sid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Operator.

service_sid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Service.

operator_sids.description: List of Operator SIDs attached to the service. Includes both Custom and Pre-built Operators.

operator_type.description: The type of the applied Language Understanding Operator. One of conversation-classify, utterance-classify, extract, extract-normalize, or pii-extract

name.description: The name of the applied Language Understanding.

operator_sid.description: A 34 character string that identifies this Language Understanding operator sid.

extract_match.description: Boolean to tell if extract Language Understanding Processing model matches results.

match_probability.description: Percentage of 'matching' class needed to consider a sentence matches

normalized_result.description: Normalized output of extraction stage which matches Label.

utterance_results.description: List of mapped utterance object which matches sentences.

utterance_match.description: Boolean to tell if Utterance matches results.

predicted_label.description: The 'matching' class. This might be available on conversation classify model outputs.

predicted_probability.description: Percentage of 'matching' class needed to consider a sentence matches.

label_probabilities.description: The labels probabilities. This might be available on conversation classify model outputs.

extract_results.description: List of text extraction results. This might be available on classify-extract model outputs.

text_generation_results.description: Output of a text generation operator for example Conversation Sumamary.

transcript_sid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Transcript.

name.description: A unique name that references an Operator's Operator Type.

sid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Operator Type.

friendly_name.description: A human-readable name of this resource, up to 64 characters.

description.description: A human-readable description of this resource, longer than the friendly name.

docs_link.description: Additional documentation for the Operator Type.

output_type.description: Operator Results for this Operator Type will follow this format. Possible values: text-classification, text-extraction, text-extraction-normalized, text-generation.

supported_languages.description: List of languages this Operator Type supports.

provider.description: Operators with this Operator Type are executed using this provider. Possible values: twilio, amazon, openai.

availability.description: Operator Type availability status. Possible values: internal, beta, public, retired.

configurable.description: Operators can be created from configurable Operator Types.

config_schema.description: JSON Schema for configuring an Operator with this Operator Type. Following https://json-schema.org/

date_created.description: The date that this Operator Type was created, given in ISO 8601 format.

date_updated.description: The date that this Operator Type was updated, given in ISO 8601 format.

account_sid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Account the Pre-built Operator belongs to.

sid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Pre-built Operator.

friendly_name.description: A human-readable name of this resource, up to 64 characters.

description.description: A human-readable description of this resource, longer than the friendly name.

author.description: The creator of the Operator. Pre-built Operators can only be created by Twilio.

operator_type.description: Operator Type for this Operator. References an existing Operator Type resource.

version.description: Numeric Operator version. Incremented with each update on the resource, used to ensure integrity when updating the Operator.

availability.description: Operator availability status. Possible values: internal, beta, public, retired.

config.description: Operator configuration, following the schema defined by the Operator Type. Only available on Custom Operators created by the Account, will be empty for Pre-Built Operators.

date_created.description: The date that this Pre-built Operator was created, given in ISO 8601 format.

date_updated.description: The date that this Pre-built Operator was updated, given in ISO 8601 format.

sentence_index.description: The index of the sentence in the transcript.

start_time.description: Offset from the beginning of the transcript when this sentence starts.

end_time.description: Offset from the beginning of the transcript when this sentence ends.

sid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Sentence.

account_sid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Account the Service belongs to.

auto_redaction.description: Instructs the Speech Recognition service to automatically redact PII from all transcripts made on this service.

media_redaction.description: Instructs the Speech Recognition service to automatically redact PII from all transcripts media made on this service. The auto_redaction flag must be enabled, results in error otherwise.

auto_transcribe.description: Instructs the Speech Recognition service to automatically transcribe all recordings made on the account.

data_logging.description:
Data logging allows Twilio to improve the quality of the speech recognition & language understanding services through using customer data to refine, fine tune and evaluate machine learning models.
Note: Data logging cannot be activated via API, only via www.twilio.com, as it requires additional consent.

date_created.description: The date that this Service was created, given in ISO 8601 format.

date_updated.description: The date that this Service was updated, given in ISO 8601 format.

friendly_name.description: A human readable description of this resource, up to 64 characters.

language_code.description: The language code set during Service creation determines the Transcription language for all call recordings processed by that Service. The default is en-US if no language code is set. A Service can only support one language code, and it cannot be updated once it's set.

sid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Service.

unique_name.description: Provides a unique and addressable name to be assigned to this Service, assigned by the developer, to be optionally used in addition to SID.

webhook_url.description: The URL Twilio will request when executing the Webhook.

webhook_http_method.description: The HTTP method for the Webhook. One of `GET` or `POST`.

read_only_attached_operator_sids.description: Operator sids attached to this service, read only

version.description: The version number of this Service.

account_sid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Account.

service_sid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Service.

sid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Transcript.

date_created.description: The date that this Transcript was created, given in ISO 8601 format.

date_updated.description: The date that this Transcript was updated, given in ISO 8601 format.

status.description: The Status of this Transcript. One of `queued`, `in-progress`, `completed`, `failed` or `canceled`.

channel.description: Media Channel describing Transcript Source and Participant Mapping

data_logging.description:
Data logging allows Twilio to improve the quality of the speech recognition & language understanding services through using customer data to refine, fine tune and evaluate machine learning models.
Note: Data logging cannot be activated via API, only via www.twilio.com, as it requires additional consent.

language_code.description: The default language code of the audio.

media_start_time.description: The date that this Transcript's media was started, given in ISO 8601 format.

duration.description: The duration of this Transcript's source

redaction.description: If the transcript has been redacted, a redacted alternative of the transcript will be available.

info.title: Twilio - Intelligence
info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.

post.description: Create a new Custom Operator for the given Account

FriendlyName.description: A human readable description of the new Operator, up to 64 characters.

OperatorType.description: Operator Type for this Operator. References an existing Operator Type resource.

Config.description: Operator configuration, following the schema defined by the Operator Type.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all Custom Operators for an Account.

parameters.name: Availability
parameters.description: Returns Custom Operators with the provided availability type. Possible values: internal, beta, public, retired.

parameters.name: LanguageCode
parameters.description: Returns Custom Operators that support the provided language code.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Custom Operator.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The If-Match HTTP request header

FriendlyName.description: A human-readable name of this resource, up to 64 characters.

Config.description: Operator configuration, following the schema defined by the Operator Type.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Custom Operator.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Custom Operator.

get.description: Get download URLs for media if possible

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: The unique SID identifier of the Transcript.

parameters.name: Redacted
parameters.description: Grant access to PII Redacted/Unredacted Media. If redaction is enabled, the default is `true` to access redacted media.

get.description: Fetch a specific Operator. Works for both Custom and Pre-built Operators.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Operator.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all Operators for an Account, both Custom and Pre-built.

parameters.name: Availability
parameters.description: Returns Operators with the provided availability type. Possible values: internal, beta, public, retired.

parameters.name: LanguageCode
parameters.description: Returns Operators that support the provided language code.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.

post.description: Attach an Operator to a Service.

parameters.name: ServiceSid
parameters.description: The unique SID identifier of the Service.

parameters.name: OperatorSid
parameters.description: The unique SID identifier of the Operator. Allows both Custom and Pre-built Operators.

delete.description: Detach an Operator from a Service.

parameters.name: ServiceSid
parameters.description: The unique SID identifier of the Service.

parameters.name: OperatorSid
parameters.description: The unique SID identifier of the Operator. Allows both Custom and Pre-built Operators.

get.description: Retrieve Operators attached to a Service.

parameters.name: ServiceSid
parameters.description: The unique SID identifier of the Service.

get.description: Retrieve a list of Operator Results for the given Transcript.

parameters.name: TranscriptSid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Transcript.

parameters.name: Redacted
parameters.description: Grant access to PII redacted/unredacted Language Understanding operator. If redaction is enabled, the default is True.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.

get.description: Fetch a specific Operator Result for the given Transcript.

parameters.name: TranscriptSid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Transcript.

parameters.name: OperatorSid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that identifies this Language Understanding operator sid.

parameters.name: Redacted
parameters.description: Grant access to PII redacted/unredacted Language Understanding operator. If redaction is enabled, the default is True.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all Operator Types for an Account.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Operator Type.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Pre-built Operator.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all Pre-built Operators for an account.

parameters.name: Availability
parameters.description: Returns Pre-built Operators with the provided availability type. Possible values: internal, beta, public, retired.

parameters.name: LanguageCode
parameters.description: Returns Pre-built Operators that support the provided language code.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.

get.description: Get all Transcript Sentences by TranscriptSid

parameters.name: TranscriptSid
parameters.description: The unique SID identifier of the Transcript.

parameters.name: Redacted
parameters.description: Grant access to PII Redacted/Unredacted Sentences. If redaction is enabled, the default is `true` to access redacted sentences.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.

post.description: Create a new Service for the given Account

UniqueName.description: Provides a unique and addressable name to be assigned to this Service, assigned by the developer, to be optionally used in addition to SID.

AutoTranscribe.description: Instructs the Speech Recognition service to automatically transcribe all recordings made on the account.

DataLogging.description:
Data logging allows Twilio to improve the quality of the speech recognition & language understanding services through using customer data to refine, fine tune and evaluate machine learning models.
Note: Data logging cannot be activated via API, only via www.twilio.com, as it requires additional consent.

FriendlyName.description: A human readable description of this resource, up to 64 characters.

LanguageCode.description: The language code set during Service creation determines the Transcription language for all call recordings processed by that Service. The default is en-US if no language code is set. A Service can only support one language code, and it cannot be updated once it's set.

AutoRedaction.description: Instructs the Speech Recognition service to automatically redact PII from all transcripts made on this service.

MediaRedaction.description: Instructs the Speech Recognition service to automatically redact PII from all transcripts media made on this service. The auto_redaction flag must be enabled, results in error otherwise.

WebhookUrl.description: The URL Twilio will request when executing the Webhook.

WebhookHttpMethod.description: The HTTP method for the Webhook. One of `GET` or `POST`.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.

Data logging allows Twilio to improve the quality of the speech recognition & language understanding services through using customer data to refine, fine tune and evaluate machine learning models.
Note: Data logging cannot be activated via API, only via www.twilio.com, as it requires additional consent.

CustomerKey.description: Used to store client provided metadata. Maximum of 64 double-byte UTF8 characters.
